2063730.name: Alaryia
2063730.description:
Alaryia is an open-world fantasy RPG!

Step into a world forged by ancient power and shattered by ambition. Once blessed by the Immortals, the noble Mystics ruled the northern continent of Aramae’Salar, raising cities of glass and stone and commanding arcane forces beyond imagination.

But their golden age is ending. From the haunting Sea of Magic, leviathans stir—primordial horrors that tore nine great ships from existence. War looms, secrets unravel, and a fractured people must choose between pride, survival, and the shadow of their own making.

Uncover a tale of wonder, betrayal, and the fall of an empire. The first chapter of an epic saga begins here.

Features

  • Choices Matter! Your decisions will change your morality and how characters interact with you, the story, and how events play out.

  • 21 Unique Professions to level. Magic, Ranged, Mining, Woodcutting, Alchemy, Cooking, Lockpicking and more. Become the jack-of-all-trades or an advanced blacksmith, or let your combat professions do all the work.

  • Explore an entire world. Alaryia consists of many races and cultures. You will be able to openly navigate and visit these places time and time again. Find your favorite city/village and create a community, and become loved by the people or raid/pillage and become infamous with a bounty on your head.

  • DnD Mechanics. As you level your professions you may get acrobatic or perception checks to find hidden treasures or navigate across dangerous objects. Sometimes you see the "roll" sometimes it happens in the background.

  • Cozy Homes! You will be able to obtain and buy houses all over the world and decorate it with your hard earned coin.

  • Arena Waves. Compete in the arena to prove you are the Champion of Alaryia!

  • No classes! Your armor and professions determine what can be equipped or what spells you will know. Become a berserker, mage, archer, or even a spell-blade. Create and mix powerful combinations for the ultimate customization.

  • Quick Travel! Learn spells as you level up magic to quickly travel around the map. Don't worry, if you would rather sport a blade or bow, local caravans will still transport you for some gold.

  • Crafting! Every main profession is paired with a profession to help you create useful tools, gear, and materials. Mining and Smithing, Woodcutting and Fletching, Fishing and Cooking, and more!

  • Customize the appearance of your character! Create the perfect character with many customization options.

  • Original Music! Our team consists of amazing composers adding custom music to fit the world of Alaryia.
